Articles.Content:
Do you want to land on Eve or flyby Duna? In this case, this mod is for you! 

Installation instructions: Go to Android/data/com.StefMorojna.Spaceflightsimulator/files/resources (or the corresponding folder on PC (note that I don't know if the mod is compatible with PC)). You will see 2 folders: Planet Data and Textures. Rename Planet data to what you want and put the Planet Data of mod in Ressources. Place the content of "Mod textures" in Textures and start your game (Save the files from the game before in case and to be able to recover your old game later (erased when the game starts again)).

The mod is not finished.

Images:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-j0iBPz5pct3ZiaQ4TLJuCUkt2jkhBkG/view?usp=drivesdk

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-jkk5cvoc8OCwJABOnhAAwhNdhk2ABM1/view?usp=drivesdk

Moved to Add-on Development.

Upon Further review, this isn't a KSP mod, so it's being moved to the Lounge.
